reviewText: Starring the gorgeous Tia Carrere, this syndicated series was a knock-off of Indiana Jones with a gender twist, based on the Hollywood conception of archaeologist as treasure hunting tomb robber.  Tia plays Sydney, butt-kicking academic and relic hunter, who has a male British sidekick who fills the bumbling female role from Temple of Doom, and the bubbly secretary who hasn't a clue.  The setting shifts from episode to episode although clearly in a studio when not on (generic) location.
